"So you're here too, <%me>?": "What are you up to, Manon?"
"Looking for something?"

"I've been investigating the
enemies here in Resol Forest."

"No, I've been studying the
enemies here in Resol Forest."

"Particularly regarding how
the DOLLS here manage themselves."

"While at first glance, the DOLLS appear to
move in a largely disorganized fashion..."

"They can also seem to move all at once as a group,
as if by way of some sort of collective consciousness."

"Do you know what I'm talking about?
The type of DOLLS referred to as Overseers."

"A perfect example
would be the Pedas Vera."

"Overseer-type DOLLS quite literally
control how other DOLLS behave."

"In other words,
like a DOLLS commander."

"The Nex Aelio that appeared here in Resol Forest
is a particularly powerful one among them."

"In the database, it's classified
as a Battlefield Overseer."

"When we lost contact with Bruder that day,
Nex Aelio had been giving orders to DOLLS all across Aelio."

"The DOLLS who received those commands turned to

"Had the de-facto command center that was Nex Aelio not been

"It was a great thing that we were able to
field a such a counter-offensive so quickly."

"I can only hope that our success
was more than just a fluke."

"Though most of what I said is just me repeating

"He does really magnificent research."
"Things are only just getting started, it seems..."

"This may be a bit much
to take in all of a sudden."

"Hehehe. Well, let's leave today's

"If I learn anything more,
